description: Corseted bodice in deep crimson with steel boning

core:description.text: A dramatically corseted bodice in a rich deep crimson hue, reinforced with hidden steel boning that cinches and defines the waist. The structured fabric holds its shape beautifully, creating a romantic silhouette reminiscent of historical gothic fashion. Lace-up closures or concealed clasps provide a secure fit while allowing for adjustment. This piece captures the essence of gothic elegance, combining Victorian-inspired structure with bold color for a striking foundation to any dark romantic ensemble.
